events.message: I am filing a claim today after my car was hit in a rear-end collision last night on Main Street.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the evaluation of your car accident claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your automobile accident claim and have begun the processing steps.
Please provide a copy of the police accident report, photos of the damage to your vehicle, and repair estimates.
All requested documents, including the police report and photos, have been submitted to support the claim.
Our investigation team has started reviewing the submitted documents and damage reports for your vehicle.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has been completed and all evidence has been evaluated.
A settlement proposal has been prepared based on damage estimates and liability assessment for your accident.
The customer has reviewed and agreed to the proposed settlement amount and terms for the claim.
The claim has been formally approved for payout based on the agreed settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued to your designated bank account as per agreement.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed following payment and customer satisfaction confirmation.
All documents and case files have been archived for your closed auto accident claim for future reference.
